location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.3180 of 1856 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Commander Felix Jones, Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Jones’s earlier letter relating to an African slave who has been despatched to Bombay via steamer, for return to his own country. Anderson writes that Government approves of Jones’s proceedings.
